about: While working as an Assistant Manager at Deloitte, I provided risk advisory and IT assurance services to clients across various industries and sectors. I hold the Certified Information Systems Auditor (CISA) credential from ISACA and the Chartered Accountant (CA) qualification from the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India. I also have the Google Cloud Digital Leader certification, which demonstrates my knowledge and skills in cloud computing and digital transformation. With over four years of work experience, I have gained expertise in internal controls,  procedure manuals, compliance regulations, and leadership. I have worked with teams of auditors and consultants to deliver high-quality projects and reports, and have supported the development and implementation of best practices and standards. My goal is to help clients identify and mitigate risks, optimize processes, and leverage technology to achieve their objectives. I am passionate about learning new skills, staying updated on the latest trends and innovations, and contributing to the growth and success of the organization.
